• Life at Salesforce Our Locations Our Locations North America Europe, Middle East, and Africa Asia Pacific Latin America Our Teams Our Teams Sales Technology & Product Customer Success Corporate Roles AI Research University University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Talent Programs Talent Programs Overview Future Pathways India Return to Work Military Fellows Our Story Newsroom Blog Careers Trust Salesforce.
• Org Sustainability Investors Give us your Feedback Structured Training: The SDR Apprentice Program offers comprehensive enablement, including sales methodology, product knowledge, and role-specific skills development.
• Mentorship and Support: Work side-by-side with experienced SDRs and sales leaders, gaining invaluable mentorship to help you progress in your career.
• Hands-on Experience: Gain real-world experience in lead qualification, profiling, and nurturing, while contributing to the success of the SDR team.
• Strong communication skills (both verbal and written).
• Previous internship or work experience in sales or customer service is a plus.
• University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager General InformationRequired CookiesFunctional CookiesAdvertising Cookies Support the SDR team by contributing to the streamlining of internal processes and workflows.
• Enthusiasm for building a career in sales and technology.
